actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for disclosure of certain information relating to retirement benefits paid to officers and employees and their survivors.

summary.text: Requires each agency administering a Government retirement system to establish procedures whereby the public can inspect and copy information regarding: (1) the entitlement of any present or former Federal officer or employee to retirement benefits under such system; (2) the periods of entitlement and annual rates of benefits; (3) the eligibility of other individuals for such benefits based on the service of such officer or employee; and (4) the periods of entitlement and annual rates of benefits for any such other individuals. Requires that such information be maintained separately from records containing information not covered by this Act, be updated at least quarterly, and be made available within 30 days of request.

titles.title: A bill to provide for disclosure of certain information relating to retirement benefits paid to officers and employees and their survivors.
